meanings.definition: An Italian appetizer consisting of toasted bread topped with tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the delicious bruschetta at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The bruschetta was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The bruschetta looked so good, it almost seemed too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and flavorful as a plate of bruschetta.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bruschetta lingered in the air, tempting everyone nearby.

meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a special bruschetta for the event.
meanings.sent2: We ordered the bruschetta as an appetizer.
meanings.sent3: The bruschetta dish was so popular, it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a well-crafted bruschetta, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the bruschetta dish were as vibrant as a summer sunset.
